Header: The SLFP’s decision on Presidential election to be taken on the 5th of this month
Content: General Secretary of the Sri Lanka Freedom Party parliamentarian Dayasiri Jayasekera says the SLFP’s decision on the upcoming Presidential election will be taken on the 5th of this month. Parliamentarian Dayasiri Jayasekera was speaking at a media briefing held in Colombo today. The Parliamentarian further stated that a decision on the forthcoming Presidential election will be taken by the Central Committee of the SLFP when they meet on the 5th. Dayasiri Jayasekera also said that discussions are ensued with other political parties on possible alliances for future elections. The press briefing was addressed by Parliamentarian Lasantha Alagiyawanna as well.
